capabilities.capability: This transformation allows IAP users to convert a string separated by whitespace to camelCase, PascalCase, kebab-case, and snake_case

entryPoint.name: Convert String to Special Cases - IAP

outputs.name: toCamelCase
outputs.description: Camel case which has no interventing spaces or underscores, and all words except the first one starting with a capital letter

outputs.name: toSnakeCase
outputs.description: Snake case which has spaces replaced by underscores

outputs.name: toKebabCase
outputs.description: Kebab case which has spaces replaced by hyphens

outputs.name: toPascalCase
outputs.description: Pascal case which has all words starting with a capital letter

name: Convert String to Special Cases - IAP
overview: Convert string to special cases including camelCase, PascalCase, kebab-case, and snake_case
webName: Convert String to Special Cases - IAP
